name: langur-burja-backend
description: Backend for Langur Burja multiplayer game

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run move:build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.move:build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p public && cp -r frontend/build/* public/
scripts.build:windows: npm run build:frontend:windows && npm run move:build:windows
scripts.build:frontend:windows: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.move:build:windows: if exist public rmdir /s /q public && mkdir public && xcopy frontend\build\* public\ /e /i
